}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :Wi-Fi Direct support, Bluetooth 4.0 + HS, PCIe + USB (BT)
*[1028:0018] Dell DW1708 - Dell P/N: WC50G (BCM43142) :[[Broadcom BCM943142Y]] PCIe M.2 Mini Card (NGFF 22x30) :[[Broadcom]] BCM43142 - 802.11bgn 1T1R (150Mbps) + BT 4.0
May be used in the following DELL laptops... *[http://www.dell.com/support/home/us/en/19/Drivers/DriversDetails?driverId=MRHYD Inspiron 15 (3551, Early 2015)] *[http://www.dell.com/support/home/us/en/19/Drivers/DriversDetails?driverId=MRHYD Inspiron 14 (3451, Early 2015)] *[http://www.dell.com/support/home/us/en/19/Drivers/DriversDetails?driverId=K9R36 Inspiron 13 (7347, Mid 2014)] *[http://www.dell.com/support/home/an/en/andhs1/Drivers/DriversDetails?driverId=7KK0W Inspiron 11 (3148)]
